title: Needing Friend :)
body: Hi :) I'm a pretty new player to League who could use some friends to play with/give me some tips. I play ADC mainly and my best champ is Kalista. I don't claim to be that good at the game yet but I reckon with some mentoring and just messing around with people I can actually communicate with (via discord or something), I could improve a lot! Chuck a comment below or add and message me in-game. Username- AlexisJade

replies.body: Hey, sent you an ingame request. i've just recently gotten back into it so just playing normal modes til i'm comfortable then moving onto ranked.
Sure, but im not that great either, ill like to play tho :D
